title: Scotogenic model from an extended electroweak symmetry
abstract: arXiv:2309.12091v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: We argue that the higher weak isospin $SU(3)_L$ manifestly unifies dark matter and normal matter in its isomultiplets for which dark matter carries a conserved dark charge while normal matter does not. The resultant gauge symmetry is given by $SU(3)_C\otimes SU(3)_L \otimes U(1)_X\otimes U(1)_G$, where the first factor is the color group, while the rest defines a theory of scotoelectroweak in which $X$ and $G$ determine electric charge $Q=T_3-1/\sqrt{3}T_8+X$ and dark charge $D=-2/\sqrt{3}T_8+G$. This setup provides both appropriate scotogenic neutrino masses and dark matter stability as preserved by a residual dark parity $P_D=(-1)^D$. Interpretation of the dark charge is further discussed, given that $SU(3)_L$ is broken at very high energy scale.
context:
Title: Scotogenic model from an extended electroweak symmetry
Abstract: arXiv:2309.12091v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: We argue that the higher weak isospin $SU(3)_L$ manifestly unifies dark matter and normal matter in its isomultiplets for which dark matter carries a conserved dark charge while normal matter does not. The resultant gauge symmetry is given by $SU(3)_C\otimes SU(3)_L \otimes U(1)_X\otimes U(1)_G$, where the first factor is the color group, while the rest defines a theory of scotoelectroweak in which $X$ and $G$ determine electric charge $Q=T_3-1/\sqrt{3}T_8+X$ and dark charge $D=-2/\sqrt{3}T_8+G$. This setup provides both appropriate scotogenic neutrino masses and dark matter stability as preserved by a residual dark parity $P_D=(-1)^D$. Interpretation of the dark charge is further discussed, given that $SU(3)_L$ is broken at very high energy scale.
tldr: 该文章提出了一个从扩展的 electroweak 对称性出发的斯科奥格模型，证明了更高弱等效力 $SU(3)_L$ 能够将暗物质与正常物质统一在等效多重态中，其中暗物质携带着一种守恒的暗电荷，而正常物质则没有。这种模型中的对称性由 $SU(3)_C\otimes SU(3)_L \otimes U(1)_X\otimes U(1)_G$ 给出，其中第一因子是色群，其余的定义了一个斯科欧电弱理论，其中 $X$ 和 $G$ 决定了电荷 $Q=T_3-1/\sqrt{3}T_8+X$ 和暗电荷 $D=-2/\sqrt{3}T_8+G$。这一设 计为中微子提供了适当的斯科奥生成机制，并为暗物质稳定性提供了解释，因为这种稳定性由残留的暗 parity $P_D=(-1)^D$ 所保持。同时，文章还讨论了暗电荷的解读，因为 $SU(3)_L$ 在非常高的能量尺度上被打破。
